headline: US Treasury Department says MetLife unit settles over Iran sanctions violations
summary: The U.S. Treasury Department said on Thursday that New York-based insurer MetLife's unit, American Life Insurance Company, agreed to settle its potential civil liability for over 2,300 apparent violations of sanctions against Iran. The Treasury Department's Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC) announced a $178,421 settlement with the MetLife unit.

headline: MetLife Named to the Fortune World’s 25 Best Workplaces™ for 2024
summary: NEW YORK, November 14, 2024--MetLife, Inc. (NYSE: MET) today announced it is among the Fortune World’s Best Workplaces™ for 2024. MetLife is one of only 25 companies who earned a spot on the list.
